title: Dot Product and Cross Product Visualizer
description: Interactive visualization comparing dot product (projection and angle) with cross product (perpendicular vector and parallelogram area).
creator: Claude AI
subject: Linear Algebra
Vectors
Dot Product
Cross Product

learningObjectives: Analyze the geometric meaning of dot product as projection
Understand the relationship between dot product and angle
Analyze the cross product as a perpendicular vector
Understand cross product magnitude as parallelogram area

controls.name: Toggle View
controls.description: Switch between 2D dot product and 3D cross product views

controls.name: Show Projection
controls.description: Toggles projection visualization in dot product view

controls.name: Show Parallelogram
controls.description: Toggles parallelogram visualization in cross product view

controls.name: Animate Angle Sweep
controls.description: Animates vector v from 0° to 180° relative to u

controls.name: Vector endpoints
controls.description: Drag to reposition vectors u and v

learningObjectives: Understand the key concepts of dot product and cross product visualizer
Explore dot product and cross product visualizer through interactive visualization
Apply knowledge of dot product and cross product visualizer to solve problems
Experiment with parameters to observe their effects on dot product and cross product visualizer
